com.nutiteq.utils

Interface OrientationManager.OnChangedListener

  • Enclosing class:
    OrientationManager

    public static interface OrientationManager.OnChangedListener
    Classes should implement this interface if they want to be notified of changes in the user's location, orientation, or the accuracy of the compass.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAccuracyChanged(OrientationManager orientationManager)
      Called when the accuracy of the compass changes.
      void onLocationChanged(OrientationManager orientationManager)
      Called when the user's location changes.
      void onOrientationChanged(OrientationManager orientationManager)
      Called when the user's orientation changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onOrientationChanged

        void onOrientationChanged(OrientationManager orientationManager)
        Called when the user's orientation changes.
        Parameters:
        orientationManager - the orientation manager that detected the change

      • onLocationChanged

        void onLocationChanged(OrientationManager orientationManager)
        Called when the user's location changes.
        Parameters:
        orientationManager - the orientation manager that detected the change

      • onAccuracyChanged

        void onAccuracyChanged(OrientationManager orientationManager)
        Called when the accuracy of the compass changes.
        Parameters:
        orientationManager - the orientation manager that detected the change
